metadata.title: ACL Templated Policies - HTTP API
metadata.description: The /acl/templated-policies endpoints manage Consul's ACL templated policies.

outlineItems.title: Read a templated policy by name

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.
